page.title: 16MORFA SPORTS STADIUM,SWANSEA
page.content:
Two years ago, a new sports stadium was built near the River Tawe. It has a running track and an Astraturf football pitch and many other facilities for track and field events. Daley Thompson officially opened the stadium, winning an invitation race.
The stadium attracts thousands of people as spectators and many smaller groups, such as cubs and schools, use its facilities. In the summer, schools from the area partake in a competitive athletics meeting. In the middle of June, hundreds of cubs play 6-a-side football matches against other packs.
In the school summer holidays, children of all ages are offered the chance of free tuition and supervision in a great variety of events.
